units.name: Thousand Sons Sorcerer in Terminator Armour

detachments.name: Chosen Cabal
detachments.flavor_text: At the command of the Thousand Sons Sorcerers, Rubric Marines and cultist thralls press through the labyrinthine corridors...

army_rule.name: Twisting Fate
army_rule.description: Units lose Cabal of Sorcerers. Gain Twisting Fate: Roll D6 when Stratagems are used; 1-2 opponent gains 1CP, 6+ you gain 1CP (if Ascendant).

detachment_rule.name: Witchsight
detachment_rule.description: Ranged weapons equipped by THOUSAND SONS models have the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

mustering_rules.error_message: Tzaangors total cannot exceed Rubric Marines count.

enhancements.name: Warp Mastery
enhancements.description: Re-roll number of attacks with a Psychic weapon.

enhancements.name: Fires of Change
enhancements.description: Select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks made with a Psychic weapon. That unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.

stratagems.name: Costly Blessing
stratagems.description: 3+ Invuln, suffer D3 MW at end of phase.

stratagems.name: Empyric Desecration
stratagems.description: Deny objective on 2+ within 6" of this unit.

stratagems.name: Inferno Bolters
stratagems.description: Shoot through closed Hatchway (exclude torrent), targets enemy within 1", attacks have 0 AP.

stratagems.name: Tzeentch's Boon
stratagems.description: Re-roll Wound roll for Psychic Attack.

detachments.name: Devoted Thralls
detachments.flavor_text: Having boarded by deceit and infiltration or through conjured warp portals, the mortal cultists of Tzeentch surge through the vessels...

army_rule.name: Twisting Fate
army_rule.description: Units lose Cabal of Sorcerers. Gain Twisting Fate: Roll D6 when Stratagems are used; 1-2 opponent gains 1CP, 6+ you gain 1CP (if Ascendant).

detachment_rule.name: Fervent Devotees
detachment_rule.description: Melee weapons equipped by THOUSAND SONS models from your army have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability while targeting an enemy unit within range of an objective marker.

enhancements.name: Thrallmaster
enhancements.description: At the start of the first battle round, you can select one friendly TZAANGORS unit within the same Entry Zone as the bearer. If you do, that unit can make a Normal move of up to 6"

enhancements.name: Prescient Authority
enhancements.description: Once per turn, when a friendly TZAANGORS unit within 3" of the bearer is selected to shoot or fight, the bearer can use this Enhancement. If it does, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that TZAANGORS unit makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

stratagems.name: Fell Sacrifice
stratagems.description: 1 enemy unit below starting strength & within engagement range, unit must take battle-shock test. If below half-strength, -1 to test.

stratagems.name: Bestial Surge
stratagems.description: Unit can move up to D6, as close as possible, towards attacking unit. Can be moved within engagement range of that unit.

detachments.name: Fateseekers
detachments.flavor_text: Amidst the twisting corridors of voidships, upon the strange tides of the warp, many esoteric and powerful prizes wait to be claimed...

army_rule.name: Twisting Fate
army_rule.description: Units lose Cabal of Sorcerers. Gain Twisting Fate: Roll D6 when Stratagems are used; 1-2 opponent gains 1CP, 6+ you gain 1CP (if Ascendant).

detachment_rule.name: Methodical Conquest
detachment_rule.description: Each time a THOUSAND SONS model from your army makes an attack while firing Overwatch, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ is required to score a hit, instead of an unmodified 6. In addition, SCARAB OCCULT TERMINATORS units from your army can perform the Set Overwatch Tactical Maneuver in the same turn as performing the Secure Site Tactical Maneuver.

rules_adaptations.gain_ability: can perform the Secure Site Tactical Manoeuvre as if they had the BATTLELINE keyword.

enhancements.name: Predestined Champion
enhancements.description: While the bearer is on the battlefield, you are considered to control one additional objective marker for the purposes of the Twisting Fate army rule.

enhancements.name: Astral Predation
enhancements.description: Once per battle, in your Movement phase, when the bearer is selected to move, it can use this Enhancement. If it does, select one closed Hatchway on the battlefield. Until the end of the phase, the bearer can move through that Hatchway as if it was open (note that this does not open that Hatchway - it remains closed).

stratagems.name: Enduring Animus
stratagems.description: Each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if it hasn't fought yet, roll one D6. On a 4+ it can fight on death.

stratagems.name: Strategic Vision
stratagems.description: Ranged weapons in this unit have the [PISTOL] ability. And models in your unit can target enemy units outside of Engagement Range.

stratagems.name: Phantasmic Munitions
stratagems.description: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit can ignore enemy models for the purposes of determining visibility.

stratagems.name: Invisible Assailants
stratagems.description: Select one enemy unit visible to your model. That unit must take a Leadership test, subtracting 1 from the result: if failed, until the start of your opponents next Movement phase, subtract 2" from the Move characteristic of models in that unit and subtract 2 from Advance and Charge rolls made for it; if passed, subtract 1" from the Move characteristic of models in that unit and subtract 1 from Advance and Charge rolls made for it.
